results.title: Lawn tennis and how to play it. No. 4. The Volley and smash
results.brief_description: Demonstrations by Horace Skeet, Mary Heeley, Miki and other celebrated players. Emphasises the importance of correct positioning of the feet for backhand and forehand volleys, and points out that it is better to place a volley rather than give it power. The smash is seen to be executed in the same way as a serve.

results.title: Lawn dogs
results.creator_credit: John Duigan, Duncan Kenworthy and Rank Film Productions
results.brief_description: Camelot Gardens is a “gated community” for the wealthy with luxurious yet sterile homes, and a security force which ensures that riff-raff will be kept off the grounds after dark. The Stockard family are the new kids on the block, obsessed with acceptance and political advancement within the community. Their ten year old daughter, Devon (Mischa Barton), is not interested in befriending children her own age. One day she wanders into the nearby woods and discovers Trent, a 22 year old who scrapes together a living by mowing the lawns of the wealthy inhabitants of Camelot Gardens. Both Trent and Devon have physical and emotional scars to deal with, and they soon become friends. However, things come to head when the community discovers that Devon’s best friend is a grown man. Cast also includes: Sam Rockwell, Chris McDonald and Kathleen Quinlan.

results.title: Lawn bowls
results.creator_credit: Don Smith and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
results.brief_description: Designed to introduce and teach the skills of lawn bowls. Introduces the game, how and where it is played, the equipment and clothing used and provides a demostration of play and scoring. The second half presents a comprehensive overview of the basic techniques required.

results.title: Lawless
results.creator_credit: Chris Kennedy, John Hillcoat, Nick Cave, Lucy Fisher, Megan Ellison, Doug Wick, Margot Wilson, Blum Hanson Allen Films, Revolt Films, Red Wagon Entertainment, Pie Films Inc., Annapurna Pictures, Yucaipa Films, Benaroya Pictures and The Weinstein Company
results.brief_description: Set in the Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by authorities who want a cut of their profits.

constellations_other.name: Outlaws and the end
constellations_other.description: Tracing connections from Sweet Country to Australian westerns and resistance to white colonial narratives.

results.title: Law: a system of order
results.creator_credit: Telemated Motion Pictures and McGraw-Hill Films
results.brief_description: Conflict is inevitable in life and each individual must give up some of their freedom in order to live peaceably in proximity with others. This film looks at some of the origins of law in earlier cultures, their mode of enforcement, and examines also a range of human actions subject to social censure - from abuses of custom to serious criminal offences.

results.title: Law of the Journey
results.brief_description: Weiwei’s installation work Law of the Journey continues the artist’s exploration of the the global refugee crisis and its impact on the people involved. The work features a 196 foot inflatable sculpture, along with walls of photographs and moving image projections.

constellations_other.name: Seeking asylum
constellations_other.description: Chauka Please Tell Us the Time was covertly filmed on a smartphone inside the Manus Island Detention Centre and sent via WhatsApp.

results.title: Law of desire
results.brief_description: The flamboyant Spanish director, Pedro Almodovar, is one of contemporary cinema’s comic masters. “Law of Desire” is an exquisite farce about the hypocrisy of machismo, whether in its homosexual or heterosexual guise. Pablo is a famous “erotic film-maker” who enjoys a discreet gay lifestyle. But when the beautiful Antonio falls for him Pablo’s world is turned upside down by the young man’s persistent and obsessive attentions. Very soon Pablo is involved in a crime of passion and his beautiful transsexual sister Tina is the only one who can save him. A festive, colourful mixture of melodrama and hilarity “Law of Desire ” celebrates sexual difference while simultaneously poking fun at the conventions of romantic love. With Antonio Banderas, Carmen Maura and Bibi Anderson.

results.title: Law Affecting Journalism
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journalism Resource Tapes”.
Creighton Burns, Editor of “The Age”, and Harry Gordon, former Editor-in-Chief at “The Herald and Weekly Times”, discuss the law of libel, defamation, and the problems and benefits of these laws in the journalist’s world.

results.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
results.brief_description: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.

results.title: Law
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the different responsibilities carried by the barrister and the solicitor. Discusses opportunities available in the practice of law, including services to business and commerce.
